scripts.test:chrome: npm run tsc && testcafe chrome --speed 0.1  ts_out/testsIndex.js
scripts.test:ff: npm run tsc && testcafe firefox -S -s screenshots --speed 1  ts_out/testsIndex.js
scripts.test:short:h: npm run tsc && testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iphone X"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iphone X"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iPad"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iPhone 6/7/8"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=Pixel 2 XL"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=Galaxy S5"  ts_out/testsIndex.js
scripts.test:all:h: npm i && npm run tsc && testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iphone X"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iphone X"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iPad Pro"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iPad"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iPhone 6/7/8"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iPhone 5/SE"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=Pixel 2 XL"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=Pixel 2"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=Galaxy S5"  ts_out/testsIndex.js
scripts.test:short: npm run tsc && testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iphone X"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iphone X"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iPad"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iPhone 6/7/8"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=Pixel 2 XL"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=Galaxy S5"  ts_out/testsIndex.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ff ; npm run tsc && testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iphone X"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iphone X"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iPad Pro"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iPad"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iPhone 6/7/8"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=iPhone 5/SE"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=Pixel 2 XL"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=Pixel 2"  ts_out/testsIndex.js ; testcafe "chrome:emulation:device=Galaxy S5"  ts_out/testsIndex.js
scripts.test:custom-emulator-h: npm run tsc && testcafe "chrome:headless:emulation:device=iphone X;cdpPort=9223"  ts_out/testsIndex.js
